event.title: April 13-17, Lebanon Street Superintendent Larry Lee said

data.event: Yard cleanup days are April 6-9 and April 13-17, Lebanon Street Superintendent Larry Lee said.
A “household haz-mat” disposal day sponsored by the Boone County Solid Waste District Management Board will be 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. May 16, the board decided at a recent quarterly meeting.

event.title: A haz-mat day will be scheduled

data.event: A haz-mat day will be scheduled this fall in Zionsville, Waste District Director Dave Lamm said.

event.title: this fall in Zionsville, Waste District Director Dave Lamm said

data.event: A haz-mat day will be scheduled this fall in Zionsville, Waste District Director Dave Lamm said.
